Method Detail

registerDevice

public java.lang.String registerDevice(java.lang.String deviceName,
                                       java.lang.String deviceType,
                                       java.lang.String deviceModel,
                                       java.lang.String powerRating)
SmartDevices should call this service to register

Parameters:
deviceName - your personal device name (e.g. my kitchen microwave)
deviceType - device class type (e.g. microwave, refrigerator, heating, air conditioner
deviceModel - any custom model number string (e.g. GE 1590x, Sony Bravio 597z)
powerRating - power rating wattage (e.g. 1.5 kW)
Returns:
If successful the unique device id (e.g. ) or any other error message. this device id must be used in all calls made to the smart meter again

registerDeviceForProgramming

public java.lang.String registerDeviceForProgramming(java.lang.String deviceID,
                                                     java.lang.String supportedPowerLevels)
SmartDevices should call this service to register as devices capable for power profile configuration

Parameters:
deviceID - the device ID got during registration, this uniquely identifies the device making the call
supportedPowerLevels - a comma separated list of supported power levels (for now please use off,standby,powersave,normal,high,full )
Returns:
acknowledgement/response - 'success' or 'fail'

requestPowerConfiguration

public java.lang.String requestPowerConfiguration(java.lang.String deviceID)
A smart device is requesting what power configuration it needs to use.

Parameters:
deviceID - the device ID got during registration, this uniquely identifies the device making the call
Returns:
The power level at which the device should operate

tellPowerConfiguration

public java.lang.String tellPowerConfiguration(java.lang.String deviceID,
                                               java.lang.String currentPowerConfiguration)
The smart device voluntarily tells the smart meter its current power configuration

Parameters:
deviceID - the device ID got during registration, this uniquely identifies the device making the call
currentPowerConfiguration - The current power level at which the device is operating
Returns:

unregisterDevice

public java.lang.String unregisterDevice(java.lang.String deviceID)
SmartDevices call this service to unregister from the SmartMeter

Parameters:
deviceID - the device ID got during registration, this uniquely identifies the device making the call
Returns:
acknowledgement - 'ok' or any other message
